title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 ยง 243.4 - Timing requirements for CSAPR NO[x] Ozone Season Group 2 allowance allocations
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 ยง 243.4 - Timing requirements for CSAPR NO[x] Ozone Season Group 2 allowance allocations

State Regulations
(a) By June 1, 2019, the department will submit to the Administrator, in a format prescribed
by the Administrator, the CSAPR NO
x

Ozone Season Group 2
allowance allocations determined in accordance with section
243.3
of this part for the 2021 and
2022 control periods. (b) By June 1, 2020, the department will submit to the Administrator, in a format prescribed
by the Administrator, the CSAPR NO
x

Ozone Season Group 2
allowance allocations determined in accordance with section
243.3
of this part for the 2023 and
2024 control periods. (c) By June 1, 2021, and June 1st of each year thereafter, the department will submit to the

Administrator, in a format prescribed by the Administrator, the CSAPR
NO
x

Ozone Season Group 2 allowance allocations
determined in accordance with section
243.3
of this part for the control
period in the fourth year following the year of the submission
deadline. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6
ยง
243.4

Adopted

New

York State Register December 2, 2015/Volume XXXVII, Issue 48, eff. 12/12/2015

Adopted

New

York State Register December 19, 2018/Volume XL, Issue 51, eff. 1/2/2019

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
